content: this pattern is created byy cchhaassssiittyy ooqquueennddoo iiff yyoouu hhaavvee aannyy pprroobblleemmss wwiitthh tthhiiss ppaatttteerrnn pplleeaassee eemmaaiill mmee at chassityoquendo@aol com ffoorr mmoorree ppaatttteerrnnss vviissiitt 77ppoollkkaaddoottss eettssyy ccoomm tttthhhhiiiissss ppppaaaatttttttteeeerrrrnnnn iiiissss ffffoooorrrr nnnnoooonnnnccccoooommmmmmmmeeeerrrrcccciiiiaaaallll uuuusssseeee oooonnnnllllyyyy pppplllleeeeaaaasssseeee ddddoooo nnnnooootttt sssseeeellllllll mmmmyyyy ppppaaaatttttttteeeerrrrnnnn iiiinnnn aaaannnnyyyy wwwwaaaayyyy sssshhhhaaaappppeeee oooorrrr ffffoooorrrrmmmm bbbbuuuutttt yyyyoooouuuu aaaarrrreeee mmmmoooorrrreeee tttthhhhaaaannnn wwwweeeellllccccoooommmmeeee ttttoooo sssseeeellllllll aaaannnnyyyy ffffiiiinnnniiiisssshhhheeeedddd pppprrrroooodddduuuucccctttt yyyyoooouuuu hhhhaaaavvvveeee mmmmaaaaddddeeee tttthhhhaaaannnnkkkk yyyyoooouuuu mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss nnnneeeeeeeeddddeeeedddd worsted weight yarn but you can use any yarn you choose crochet hook size f yarn needle for weaving in ends polyester fiberfill optional for a one piece plush jar note the lid to the baby food jar is removable to simulate a real jar however if you want a one piece plush jar the pattern for that is below in red aaaabbbbbbbbrrrreeeevvvviiiiaaaattttiiiioooonnnnssss blo- back loop only flo- front loop only ffffoooooooodddd jjjjaaaarrrr with the baby food color green for peas orange for carrots or cream for apples or bananas work in the round not joining every round use a stitch marker to mark row round 1 make a magic loop and single_crochet 6 in the loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet twice in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3 single_crochet 1 single_crochet twice in next st around 18 sts round 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet twice in next st around 24 sts round 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet twice in next st around 30 sts round 6 blo single_crochet around round 7-9 single_crochet around change to color for label this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com round 10-14 single_crochet around change back to color for baby food round 15-17 single_crochet around round 18 blo single_crochet 3 decrease around 24 sts round 19 flo single_crochet around fasten_off leaving a long tail do not stuff for open jar weave in ends lllliiiidddd with lid color work in the round not joining every round use a stitch marker to mark row repeat rnds 1-6 of jar fasten_off leaving a long tail weave in ends pattern for a one piece plush baby food jar ffffoooooooodddd jjjjaaaarrrr repeat rnds 1-17 of jar switch to lid color round 18-19 single_crochet around round 20 blo single_crochet 3 decrease around 24 sts round 21 single_crochet 2 decrease around 18 sts stuff jar with polyester fiberfill as much as you can this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com round 22 single_crochet decrease around 12 sts round 23 decrease around 6 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail use the yarn needle to sew the hole shut weave in ends note you can choose to embroider the label with the name of the food ssssppppoooooooonnnn with color for spoon can be any color for a baby spoon a plastic spoon or a metal spoon round 1 make a magic loop and single_crochet 6 in
